attributes.action: PIP breast implants - help for all victims in Britain
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned ask that the Prime Minister properly investigates and acknowledges the damage to health, both existing and potential, to all women in Britain affected by the fraudulent manufacture of PIP Breast Implants. We also ask that the cosmetic surgeons responsible for implanting these faulty devices bear the responsibility and cost of removing and replacing these implants for all affected women.
